Regulation Name(s): Device To Detect And Measure Non-Microbial Analyte(S) In Human Clinical Specimens To Aid In Assessment Of Patients With Suspected Sepsis
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Access PCT chemiluminescent immunoassay for quantitative determination of procalcitonin in serum and plasma to assess risk of progression to severe sepsis and septic shock.
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro quantitative determination of procalcitonin (PCT) in human serum and plasma (lithium heparin and EDTA) using Access Immunoassay Systems to aid in risk assessment of critically ill patients for progression to severe sepsis and septic shock.
